title: Privilege
beginning: Draw 1
middle: Take 1 gold
end: Revive 1

title: Conscript a hostage
beginning: Use the lowest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take its time in gold
end: If it is red, take 1 gold

title: Disguise as a peasant
beginning: If there is no lower rank played plot than this, use your top discard plot
middle: Take its time in gold
end: If your top discard plot is rank 10 or lower, revive 1

title: Found a charity
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, take 5 gold
middle: Take 1 gold for each lower rank played plot
end: If the highest rank played plot is yellow, take 5 gold

title: Hire a mercenary
beginning: If there is another red played plot, pay 1 gold
middle: Use the lowest rank played plot other than this
end: If it is red, draw as many as it has time

title: Revolutionize court fashion
beginning: If the left timeline plot is green, use it
middle: Revive as many as it has time
end: If your top discard plot is green, draw 1

title: Court the Duchess
beginning: If the left timeline plot is yellow, take 1 gold
middle: If the left timeline plot is green, revive 1
end: Use the left timeline plot twice

title: Smite the Chamberlain
beginning: If the left timeline plot is yellow, use it
middle: If your top discard plot is yellow, appoint it
end: Use the highest rank yellow dungeon plot

title: Become the Sheriff
beginning: If you have 10 or less gold, use the highest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take its time in gold
end: If you have 5 or less hand plots, draw 1 for each unique dungeon plot

title: Give your daughter in marriage
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each plot in your hand
middle: If the left 2 timeline plots are the same color, use them in order
end: Otherwise, take their total time in gold

title: Advocate reform
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, draw 1
middle: If you have 5 or less hand plots, take 1 gold
end: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank

title: Receive prophesy
beginning: If you have 5 or less hand plots, draw 1
middle: Look at your top deck plot, then put it back
end: Put 1 plot from your hand face down on your deck

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay the left timeline plot's time in gold
middle: Draw that many
end: Draw 1 for each green plot in the timeline

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: Take your top discard plot's time in gold
middle: Put your top discard plot face down on your deck
end: If your top discard plot is yellow, take 1 gold

title: Rob the wretched
beginning: Use the lowest rank dungeon plot
middle: If it has a lower rank, take its rank in gold
end: Otherwise, take 1 gold for each dungeon plot

title: Impersonate a foreign Countess
beginning: Take the highest time dungeon plot's time in gold
middle: Revive as many as the left timeline plot has time
end: If your top discard plot has a lower rank, use it

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
beginning: Take the highest time played plot's time in gold
middle: Take the highest time court plot's time in gold
end: If there is a lower rank dungeon plot, pay 1 gold

title: Kidnap the Judge
beginning: If your top discard plot is red, use the highest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take its time gold
end: Revive as many as it has time

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard plot is green, draw 1
middle: Revive 1 for each green timeline plot
end: If the left timeline plot is green, take 1 gold

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: Take your top discard plot's time in gold
middle: If your top discard plot is yellow, use it
end: Otherwise, appoint it

title: Jailbreak
beginning: Use the highest rank green dungeon plot
middle: Use the highest rank yellow dungeon plot
end: Revive 1 for each unique green dungeon plot

title: Secretly author plays
beginning: Pay 1 for each played green plot
middle: Take the highest played time in gold
end: Take the lowest played power in gold

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Take your top discard plot's rank in gold
middle: If it is green, appoint it
end: If it is red, revive 1

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: Use the lowest rank red timeline plot
middle: If there is a higher rank red timeline plot, take the lower rank in gold
end: Otherwise, revive 1

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: If your top discard plot is green, use it
middle: Take 1 gold for each green timeline plot
end: If the left timeline plot is green, revive 1

title: Hold a market fair
beginning: If the left and second left timeline plots are different colors, draw 2
middle: Take 1 gold for each yellow played plot
end: If the left and right timeline plots are different colors, take 2 gold

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Use the lowest rank yellow played plot
middle: If there is no yellow played plot, use the lowest rank yellow dungeon plot
end: If there is no yellow played or dungeon plot, use the leftmost yellow timeline plot

title: Mask the Crown Princess
beginning: If your top discard plot is red, appoint it
middle: If you have 5 or less discard plots, take your top discard plot's time in gold
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Steal the diamond
beginning: Revive 1
middle: If your deck or discard is empty, take 5 gold
end: Otherwise, appoint your entire hand

title: Bribe the Judge
beginning: If the left timeline plot is green, pay 1 gold
middle: Revive 1 for each unique green dungeon plot
end: Take 1 gold for each unique yellow dungeon plot

title: Embezzle funds
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, take 5 gold
middle: Revive 1 for each unique yellow dungeon plot
end: Take 1 gold for each unique yellow dungeon plot

title: Torture the spymaster
beginning: Use the highest rank green dungeon plot
middle: Revive as many as it has time
end: Take its time in gold

title: Excommunicate the Cardinal
beginning: If your top discard plot is red, appoint it
middle: Otherwise, if it is yellow, revive 1
end: If one of the left two timeline plots are green, but not both draw 2

title: Declare bankruptcy
beginning: Revive 1 for each green plot in your deck
middle: Take 1 gold for each yellow plot in your deck
end: Appoint your entire deck

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: Use your top discard plot
middle: Revive 1 for each red timeline plot
end: Use the highest rank red played plot

title: Promise a title
beginning: Count your deck plots
middle: If you have 5 or less, draw your entire deck
end: Otherwise, take 5 gold

title: Control the guilds
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, use it
middle: Take 1 gold for each timeline plot of its color
end: If the left timeline plot is the same color, draw 2

title: Start a riot
beginning: Use the lowest rank timeline plot next to a green plot
middle: If your top discard plot is green, appoint it
end: Otherwise, if it is yellow, revive 1

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
beginning: Draw 1 for each unique dungeon plot
middle: Take the lowest rank dungeon plot's power in gold
end: Use the highest rank dungeon plot

title: Collect rents
beginning: Take 1 gold for each played plot rank 10 or lower
middle: Take 1 gold for each unique dungeon plot rank 10 or lower
end: If your top discard plot is rank 10 or lower, take 1 gold

title: Plunder the treasury
beginning: Use the highest rank yellow played plot
middle: Take 2 gold for each yellow timeline plot
end: Use the highest rank yellow dungeon plot

title: Confiscate estates
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, take 1 gold
middle: Take 2 gold for each unique dungeon plot
end: If you have 5 or more hand plots, appoint your top discard plot

title: Organize a mutiny
beginning: Use the highest rank played plot other than this
middle: If it is red, draw 3
end: Otherwise, use it again

title: Move the capital
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, appoint it
middle: Otherwise, if it is red, revive 1
end: Draw 4

title: Issue bonds
beginning: If your top discard plot is rank 30 or higher, appoint it
middle: Take the left timeline plot's rank in gold
end: If there is a red played plot, pay 10 gold

title: Declare martial law
beginning: Use the highest ranked played plot
middle: If the highest rank timeline plot is green, use it
end: Otherwise, use the left timeline plot

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: Pay 30 gold
middle: Revive until you have 10 plots in hand
end: If the left timeline plot is green, take 10 gold

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Take the highest rank dungeon plot's rank in gold
middle: Take your top discard plot's rank in gold
end: Take the left timeline plot's rank in gold

title: Streetfight
beginning: Use your top discard plot
middle: Take 10 times it's time in gold
end: Revive 3

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: If the left timeline plot is green, pay 1 gold
middle: Draw your entire deck
end: Revive 1 for each unique dungeon plot

title: Invest a Bishop
beginning: Take 30 gold for each played plot rank 30 or above
middle: Appoint 1 plot from your hand
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Declare independence
beginning: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
middle: Use the highest rank green played plot
end: Use the highest rank yellow played plot

beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, take 1 gold for each timeline plot
